code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./styledheader.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const userRole=Cookies.get('userRole');const handleLogout=()=>{Cookies.remove('authToken',{path:'/'});Cookies.remove('userRole',{path:'/'});Cookies.remove('userId',{path:'/'});navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-items-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"link-style",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-list-item",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"link-style",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-list-item",children:"Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"link-style",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-list-item",children:"Cart"})}),userRole==='admin'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",className:"link-style",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-list-item",children:"Admin"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"logout-btn",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]});};export default Header;
